education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Bachelor of Business Administration, Finance
details: Undergraduate Coursework: Machine Learning; Software Engineering; Database Management, Comp. Architecture; Object- oriented programming, Artificial Intelligence, Statistic Computing
Certification & Awards: Dean's List, Intermediate IOS Development Certification (CodePath), AWS Cloud Practitioner Course, Web Development Bootcamp

description: Collaborated with senior engineers to develop a full-stack internal microservice that manages payments data using Go, Vue.js, and MySQL
Implemented PHP scripts to automate data management processes, enhancing operational efficiency
Demonstrated proficiency in following team Agile workflow, Docker, Kubernetes and AWS development practices, JENKINS CI/CD processes, and testing procedures to ensure efficient software delivery
Ran data migrations and one-offs to deploy changes to MySQL database, fixing 200+ test cases for MySQL version update
Collaborated with PhD candidates and professor to design the ConvoSense dataset aimed at improving common sense understanding within natural language processing

Built a Conversational AI model based on a Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) framework that effectively pulls information across 12K+ university websites and 50+ departments into one centralized platform for students and professors to use

Constructing a submission to the 2024 North American Association of Computational Linguistics (NAACL) Conference on a LLM-based dynamic information extraction technique designed to improve the personability of Conversational Agent interactions
Reduced data collection costs by over 80% by building LLM-powered data generation pipelines to generate synthetic dialogues

projects.name: Eagle Rating[Group Project]
description: Led a team of 5 to develop a full-stack web application platform where Emory students can provide ratings on places around campus using Java Spring Boot and React
Implemented search by tags and filtering functions, allowing efficient data query from MongoDB database
Utilized Docker to containerize the application, ensuring consistent operation across different development and production environments and simplifying deployment processes

projects.name: DQN Stock Trading Project [Independent]
description: Leveraged Python, TensorFlow, and Keras to create a Deep Q-Network (DQN) for automated stock trading
Engineered a multi-stock trading environment with state representation, action space, and reward computation
Utilized scikit-learn for data preprocessing and designed a custom neural network using Keras

projects.name: BlogSmart [Group project]
description: Directed a team of 4 to design an iOS platform where users compose AI-assisted blogs, research papers, and editorials using OpenAI's GPT-3.5
Introduced an AI-driven peer review for enhanced content quality and originality
Implemented CRUD functions using Parse Back4app DB to store user's blogs

other.title: Skills
content: Languages: Python, Java, SQL, PHP, Golang, JavaScript, CSS, R
Technologies: Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins CI/CD, Jira, Node.js, React.js, MongoDB, AWS, React.js, Vue.js, Git
